Proyecto1.DatosParty

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • Proyecto1.DatosParty.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for the implementation of the player, it allows the sowfware to move, draw and interct with players.

      • Player

        public Player(int playerNumber,

        Constructor of the class player
        Parameters:

        nickname - string for the name that the user selected.

      • calcPossibleMoves

        public SimpleLinkedList<Box> calcPossibleMoves(int avaliableMoves)
                                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Parameters:
        avaliableMoves - cantidad de casillas disponibles para avanzar
        Returns:
        list with the possible boxes to move.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - from the list, if the index its out of range, or if the value is unespected, what means that something went wrong

      • MoveTo

        public void MoveTo(int boxExcelid)
            throws java.lang.Exception
        Move the player to a box given its id, which was defined on the prototype of the board, and as the board ist always the same we can assume the values are right.
        Parameters:
        boxExcelid - id of the new box
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the index of the acces() its out of range

      • MoveTo

        public void MoveTo(Phase newPhase,
                   int actualBox)
            throws java.lang.Exception
        Moves a player to a different box
        Parameters:
        newPhase - phase to move the player
        actualBox - zero-based index of the new box.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the index of the new box, doesnt apply for the new phaese.

      • rollDices

        public SimpleLinkedList<Box> rollDices()
                                throws java.lang.Exception
        Se lanzan los dados, y se resaltan las casillas resultantes y se envia la lista al controller de la ventana que se usa para elegir una casilla
        Returns:
        returns a list with the possible moves after rolling the dices.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - from the acces() method on list.
